30  // Init globals
31  JavaTrace::TRACE_ENDIANESS JavaTrace::endianess = TRACE_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN;
32  string JavaTrace::version = "1.2";
33 
34  JavaTrace::JavaTrace(const char *name, bool tof, unsigned long int limit)
35  :Trace(name, Trace::BINARY, tof), taskList(10)
36  {
37  if (endianess == TRACE_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN) probeEndianess();
38  const char cver[] = "version 1.2";
39  if (toFile) _os.write(cver, sizeof(cver));
40  filenum = 0;
41  fileLimit = limit;
42  }
43 
44  JavaTrace::~JavaTrace()
45  {
46  // WARNING: the data vector is cleared but its content isn't. It
47  // must be deleted manually (close).
48  if (toFile) Trace::close();
49  else data.clear();
50  }
51 
52  void JavaTrace::probeEndianess(void)
53  {
54  // Used for endianess check (Big/Little!)
55  static char const big_endian[] = {
56  static_cast<char const>(0xff),
57  static_cast<char const>(0),
58  static_cast<char const>(0xff),
59  static_cast<char const>(0)};
60  static int const probe = 0xff00ff00;
61  int *probePtr = (int *)(big_endian);
62 
63  if (*probePtr == probe) endianess = TRACE_BIG_ENDIAN;
64  else endianess = TRACE_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
65  //DBGFORCE("Endianess: " << (endianess == TRACE_LITTLE_ENDIAN ? "Little\n" : "Big\n"));
66  }
67 
68  void JavaTrace::close()
69  {
70  if (toFile) Trace::close();
71  else {
72  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) delete data[i];
73  data.clear();
74  }
75  }
76 
77  void JavaTrace::record(Event* e)
78  {
79  DBGENTER(_JTRACE_DBG_LEV);
80  TaskEvt* ee = dynamic_cast<TaskEvt*>(e);
81 
82  if (ee == NULL) {
83  DBGPRINT("The event is not a TaskEvt");
84 
85  return;
86  }
87 
88  Task* task = ee->getTask();
89  if (task != NULL) {
90  vector<int>::const_iterator p = find(taskList.begin(), taskList.end(),
91  task->getID());
92  if (p == taskList.end()) {
93  TraceNameEvent* a = new TraceNameEvent(ee->getLastTime(),
94  task->getID(), task->getName());
95  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
96  else data.push_back(a);
97  taskList.push_back(task->getID());
98  }
99  }
100 
101  // at this point we have to see what kind of event it is...
102 
103  if (dynamic_cast<ArrEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
104  DBGPRINT("ArrEvt");
105  ArrEvt* tae = dynamic_cast<ArrEvt*>(e);
106  TraceArrEvent* a = new TraceArrEvent(e->getLastTime(), task->getID());
107  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
108  else data.push_back(a);
109  Task* rttask = dynamic_cast<Task*>(task);
110  if (rttask) {
111  TraceDlineSetEvent* b = new TraceDlineSetEvent(tae->getLastTime(),
112  rttask->getID(),
113  rttask->getDeadline());
114  if (toFile) b->write(_os);
115  else data.push_back(b);
116  }
117  } else if (dynamic_cast<EndEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
118  DBGPRINT("EndEvt");
119  EndEvt* tee = dynamic_cast<EndEvt*>(e);
120 
121  TraceEndEvent* a = new TraceEndEvent(tee->getLastTime(), task->getID(),
122  tee->getCPU());
123  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
124  else data.push_back(a);
125  } else if (dynamic_cast<DeschedEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
126  DBGPRINT("DeschedEvt");
127  DeschedEvt *tde = dynamic_cast<DeschedEvt *>(e);
128 
129  TraceDeschedEvent* a = new TraceDeschedEvent(tde->getLastTime(),
130  task->getID(),
131  tde->getCPU());
132  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
133  else data.push_back(a);
134  } else if (dynamic_cast<WaitEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
135  DBGPRINT("WaitEvt");
136  WaitEvt* we = dynamic_cast<WaitEvt*>(e);
137  //WaitInstr* instr = dynamic_cast<WaitInstr*>(we->getInstr());
138  WaitInstr* instr = we->getInstr();
139  string res = instr->getResource();
140  TraceWaitEvent* a = new TraceWaitEvent(we->getLastTime(),
141  task->getID(), res);
142  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
143  else data.push_back(a);
144  } else if (dynamic_cast<SignalEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
145  DBGPRINT("SignalEvt");
146  SignalEvt* se = dynamic_cast<SignalEvt*>(e);
147  //SignalInstr* instr = dynamic_cast<SignalInstr*>(se->getInstr());
148  SignalInstr* instr = se->getInstr();
149  string res = instr->getResource();
150  TraceSignalEvent* a = new TraceSignalEvent(se->getLastTime(),
151  task->getID(), res);
152  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
153  else data.push_back(a);
154  } else if (dynamic_cast<SchedEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
155  DBGPRINT("SchedEvt");
156  SchedEvt* tse = dynamic_cast<SchedEvt*>(e);
157 
158  TraceSchedEvent* a = new TraceSchedEvent(tse->getLastTime(),
159  task->getID(), tse->getCPU());
160  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
161  else data.push_back(a);
162 // } else if (dynamic_cast<DlinePostEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
163 // DBGPRINT("DlinePostEvt");
164 // DlinePostEvt* dpe = dynamic_cast<DlinePostEvt*>(e);
165 // TraceDlinePostEvent* a = new TraceDlinePostEvent(dpe->getLastTime(),
166 // task->getID(),
167 // dpe->getPrevDline(),
168 // dpe->getPostDline());
169 // if (toFile) a->write(_os);
170 // else data.push_back(a);
171  } else if (dynamic_cast<DeadEvt*>(e) != NULL) {
172  DBGPRINT("DlineMissEvt");
173  DeadEvt* de = dynamic_cast<DeadEvt*>(e);
174  TraceDlineMissEvent* a = new TraceDlineMissEvent(de->getLastTime(),
175  task->getID());
176  if (toFile) a->write(_os);
177  else data.push_back(a);
178  }
179 
180  if (toFile) _os.flush();
181 
182  }
183 
184 }
